Package pizzapazza.math

Class Z4AffineTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzapazza.math.Z4AffineTransform
  • public class Z4AffineTransform
extends java.lang.Object
    A 2D affine transform
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Z4AffineTransform concatenate​(Z4AffineTransform Tx)
      Concatenates an affine transform Tx to this affine transform Cx, that is Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p))
      Z4AffineTransform concatenateRotate​(double angle)
      Concatenates a rotation Tx to this affine transform Cx, that is Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p))
      Z4AffineTransform concatenateScale​(double sx, double sy)
      Concatenates a scaling Tx to this affine transform Cx, that is Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p))
      Z4AffineTransform concatenateShear​(double shx, double shy)
      Concatenates a shearing Tx to this affine transform Cx, that is Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p))
      Z4AffineTransform concatenateTranslate​(double tx, double ty)
      Concatenates a translation Tx to this affine transform Cx, that is Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p))
      Z4AffineTransform inverse()
      Returns the inverse of this affine transform
      static Z4AffineTransform rotate​(double angle)
      Returns a transform representing a rotation
      static Z4AffineTransform scale​(double sx, double sy)
      Returns a transform representing a scaling
      static Z4AffineTransform shear​(double shx, double shy)
      Returns a transform representing a shearing
      Z4Point transform​(double x, double y)
      Transforms a point
      static Z4AffineTransform translate​(double tx, double ty)
      Returns a transform representing a translation

      • shear

        public static Z4AffineTransform shear​(double shx,
                                      double shy)
        Returns a transform representing a shearing
        Parameters:
        shx - The shift multiplier in the direction of the positive x-axis as a factor of their y coordinate
        shy - The shift multiplier in the direction of the positive y-axis as a factor of their X coordinate
        Returns:
        A transform representing a shearing
